  groupByCategory(menuItems) {
    // Group menu items by category
    const categories = {};
    menuItems.forEach(item => {

      categories[item.category].push(item);
    });

      deliveryFee: 'KES 150',
      minimumOrder: 'KES 800',
      freeDeliveryThreshold: 'KES 2,000',
      guarantee: '35 minutes or free'
    };
  },
  // Get deals
  async getDeals() {
    // Mock deals for now
    return ['Large Pizza Deal', 'Family Bundle', 'Student Discount', 'Weekend Special', 'Lunch Special', 'Happy Hour'];
  },
  // Get rewards info
  async getRewards() {
    // Mock rewards info for now
    return {
      available: true,
      program: 'Papa Rewards',
      benefits: ['Points on every order', 'Free pizza on birthday', 'Exclusive member deals', 'Early access to promotions']
    };
  },
  // Get customization options
  async getCustomization() {
    // Mock customization info for now
    return {
      available: true,
      options: {
        sizes: ['Small', 'Medium', 'Large', 'Extra Large'],
        crusts: ['Original Crust', 'Thin Crust', 'Pan', 'Stuffed Crust', 'Gluten Free'],
        toppings: ['Pepperoni', 'Sausage', 'Bacon', 'Ham', 'Chicken', 'Mushrooms', 'Green Peppers', 'Onions', 'Black Olives', 'Pineapple', 'Extra Cheese', 'Spinach'],
        sauces: ['Tomato', 'BBQ', 'Alfredo', 'Ranch', 'Hot Sauce', 'Pesto']
      }
    };
  },
  // Get all locations
  async getLocations() {
    // Mock locations for now
    return ['Westlands', 'CBD', 'Kilimani', 'Lavington', 'Karen', 'Mombasa Road', 'Thika Road', 'Nakuru', 'Mombasa', 'Kisumu', 'Eldoret', 'Kakamega', 'Nyeri', 'Embu', 'Meru', 'Thika', 'Machakos', 'Kiambu'];
  }
};
export default papaJohnsAPI;

sourcesContent:
// Papa John's API Service
// Using TheMealDB (completely free, no CORS issues) for real pizza data

const PAPA_JOHNS_CONFIG = {
  restaurant: {
    name: "Papa John's",
    description: "Better ingredients. Better pizza. Papa John's.",
    location: "Nairobi, Kenya",
    phone: "+254 700 000 000",
    website: "https://www.papajohns.co.ke",
    founded: "1984",
    branches: "5,500+",
    specialties: ["Fresh Dough", "Premium Toppings", "Signature Sauces"],
    rating: 4.4,
    deliveryTime: "25-35 min"
  }
};

// TheMealDB API endpoints (completely free, no CORS issues)
const THEMEALDB_API = {
  baseURL: 'https://www.themealdb.com/api/json/v1/1',
  endpoints: {
    pizza: '/filter.php?c=Pizza',
    drinks: '/filter.php?c=Cocktail',
    mealDetails: '/lookup.php?i='
  }
};

export const papaJohnsAPI = {
  async getFullMenu() {
    try {
      console.log('üçï Fetching Papa John\'s menu from TheMealDB...');
      
      // Try to get real pizza data first
      const realMenu = await this.getRealPizzaMenu();
      if (realMenu && realMenu.length > 0) {
        console.log('‚úÖ Real pizza data loaded successfully');
        return {
          restaurant: PAPA_JOHNS_CONFIG.restaurant,
          menu: realMenu,
          promotions: this.getPromotions(),
          deals: this.getDeals(),
          rewards: this.getRewards(),
          customization: this.getCustomization(),
          locations: this.getLocations()
        };
      }
      
      console.log('‚ö†Ô∏è Using enhanced mock data as fallback');
      return this.getEnhancedMockMenu();
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('‚ùå Error fetching Papa John\'s menu:', error);
      return this.getEnhancedMockMenu();
    }
  },

  async getRealPizzaMenu() {
    try {
      // Fetch real pizza data from TheMealDB
      const pizzaResponse = await fetch(THEMEALDB_API.endpoints.pizza);
      const pizzaData = await pizzaResponse.json();
      
      // Fetch real drinks data
      const drinksResponse = await fetch(THEMEALDB_API.endpoints.drinks);
      const drinksData = await drinksResponse.json();
      
      // Transform real data to our format
      const transformedMenu = [];
      
      // Add real pizzas
      if (pizzaData.meals) {
        for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(pizzaData.meals.length, 10); i++) {
          const pizza = pizzaData.meals[i];
          const pizzaDetails = await this.getMealDetails(pizza.idMeal);
          
          transformedMenu.push({
            id: `pizza-${pizza.idMeal}`,
            name: pizza.strMeal,
            description: pizzaDetails?.strInstructions?.substring(0, 100) + '...' || 'Delicious pizza made with fresh ingredients',
            price: this.generatePizzaPrice(),
            category: 'Pizzas',
            image: pizza.strMealThumb,
            calories: Math.floor(Math.random() * 300) + 200,
            serves: '1 person',
            preparationTime: '20-25 min',
            isPromo: Math.random() > 0.7,
            promoText: 'Hot Deal!',
            signature: Math.random() > 0.8,
            size: ['Small', 'Medium', 'Large'][Math.floor(Math.random() * 3)],
            crust: ['Classic', 'Thin', 'Stuffed', 'Pan'][Math.floor(Math.random() * 4)],
            tags: ['Fresh', 'Cheese', 'Tomato'],
            allergens: ['Gluten', 'Dairy'],
            spiceLevel: 'None'
          });
        }
      }
      
      // Add real drinks
      if (drinksData.meals) {
        for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(drinksData.meals.length, 8); i++) {
          const drink = drinksData.meals[i];
          const drinkDetails = await this.getMealDetails(drink.idMeal);
          
          transformedMenu.push({
            id: `drink-${drink.idMeal}`,
            name: drink.strMeal,
            description: drinkDetails?.strInstructions?.substring(0, 100) + '...' || 'Refreshing beverage to complement your meal',
            price: this.generateDrinkPrice(),
            category: 'Beverages',
            image: drink.strMealThumb,
            calories: Math.floor(Math.random() * 150) + 50,
            serves: '1 person',
            preparationTime: '5 min',
            isPromo: Math.random() > 0.8,
            promoText: 'Happy Hour!',
            tags: ['Refreshing', 'Cold'],
            allergens: [],
            spiceLevel: 'None'
          });
        }
      }
      
      // Add some mock sides and desserts to complete the menu
      transformedMenu.push(...this.getMockSidesAndDesserts());
      
      return transformedMenu;
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('‚ùå Error fetching real pizza data:', error);
      return null;
    }
  },

  async getMealDetails(mealId) {
    try {
      const response = await fetch(`${THEMEALDB_API.endpoints.mealDetails}${mealId}`);
      const data = await response.json();
      return data.meals?.[0] || null;
    } catch (error) {
      console.error('‚ùå Error fetching meal details:', error);
      return null;
    }
  },

  generatePizzaPrice() {
    const prices = ['KES 1,300', 'KES 1,600', 'KES 1,900', 'KES 2,300', 'KES 2,600'];
    return prices[Math.floor(Math.random() * prices.length)];
  },

  generateDrinkPrice() {
    const prices = ['KES 280', 'KES 320', 'KES 380', 'KES 420'];
    return prices[Math.floor(Math.random() * prices.length)];
  },

  getMockSidesAndDesserts() {
    return [
      {
        id: 'side-1',
        name: 'Garlic Knots',
        description: 'Soft bread knots brushed with garlic butter and herbs',
        price: 'KES 380',
        category: 'Sides',
        image: '/images/food/placeholder-food.jpg',
        calories: 200,
        serves: '1 person',
        preparationTime: '10 min',
        tags: ['Bread', 'Garlic', 'Herbs'],
        allergens: ['Gluten', 'Dairy']
      },
      {
        id: 'side-2',
        name: 'Buffalo Wings',
        description: 'Spicy wings with ranch dipping sauce',
        price: 'KES 850',
        category: 'Sides',
        image: '/images/food/placeholder-food.jpg',
        calories: 350,
        serves: '1 person',
        preparationTime: '18 min',
        tags: ['Chicken', 'Spicy', 'Wings'],
        allergens: ['Gluten']
      },
      {
        id: 'dessert-1',
        name: 'Chocolate Chip Cookie',
        description: 'Warm chocolate chip cookie with vanilla ice cream',
        price: 'KES 480',
        category: 'Desserts',
        image: '/images/food/placeholder-food.jpg',
        calories: 320,
        serves: '1 person',
        preparationTime: '8 min',
        tags: ['Chocolate', 'Warm', 'Ice Cream'],
        allergens: ['Gluten', 'Dairy', 'Eggs']
      }
    ];
  },

  // Enhanced mock menu with realistic Papa John's data
  getEnhancedMockMenu() {
    console.log('üçï Loading Papa John\'s enhanced mock menu...');
    return {
      restaurant: PAPA_JOHNS_CONFIG.restaurant,
      categories: {
        'Signature Pizzas': [
          {
            id: 'sp-001',
            name: 'The Works',
            price: 'KES 1,300',
            description: 'Pepperoni, sausage, mushrooms, green peppers, onions, black olives, and extra cheese',
            category: 'Signature Pizzas',
            image: '/images/food/papa-johns-works.jpg',
            isPromo: true,
            promoText: 'Popular',
            calories: '1,200',
            serves: '3-4 people',
            allergens: ['Gluten', 'Dairy', 'Pork', 'Mushrooms'],
            preparationTime: '18-25 min',
            spiceLevel: 'Medium',
            tags: ['Signature', 'Loaded', 'Popular'],
            vegetarian: false,
            signature: true,
            size: 'Large',
            crust: 'Original Crust'
          },
          {
            id: 'sp-002',
            name: 'BBQ Chicken Bacon',
            price: 'KES 1,200',
            description: 'BBQ sauce with grilled chicken, bacon, red onions, and mozzarella cheese',
            category: 'Signature Pizzas',
            image: '/images/food/papa-johns-bbq-chicken.jpg',
            isPromo: false,
            calories: '1,100',
            serves: '3-4 people',
            allergens: ['Gluten', 'Dairy', 'Chicken', 'Pork'],
            preparationTime: '18-25 min',
            spiceLevel: 'Mild',
            tags: ['Signature', 'BBQ', 'Chicken'],
            vegetarian: false,
            signature: false,
            size: 'Large',
            crust: 'Original Crust'
          },
          {
            id: 'sp-003',
            name: 'Garden Fresh',
            price: 'KES 1,000',
            description: 'Fresh mushrooms, green peppers, onions, black olives, tomatoes, and spinach',
            category: 'Signature Pizzas',
            image: '/images/food/papa-johns-garden-fresh.jpg',
            isPromo: false,
            calories: '850',
            serves: '2-3 people',
            allergens: ['Gluten', 'Dairy', 'Mushrooms'],
            preparationTime: '15-20 min',
            spiceLevel: 'Mild',
            tags: ['Signature', 'Vegetarian', 'Fresh'],
            vegetarian: true,
            signature: false,
            size: 'Large',
            crust: 'Original Crust'
          }
        ],
        'Classic Pizzas': [
          {
            id: 'cp-001',
            name: 'Margherita',
            price: 'KES 800',
            description: 'Traditional tomato sauce with mozzarella cheese and fresh basil leaves',
            category: 'Classic Pizzas',
            image: '/images/food/papa-johns-margherita.jpg',
            isPromo: true,
            promoText: 'Classic',
            calories: '750',
            serves: '2-3 people',
            allergens: ['Gluten', 'Dairy'],
            preparationTime: '15-20 min',
            spiceLevel: 'Mild',
            tags: ['Classic', 'Vegetarian', 'Traditional'],
            vegetarian: true,
            signature: true,
            size: 'Medium',
            crust: 'Original Crust'
          },
          {
            id: 'cp-002',
            name: 'Pepperoni',
            price: 'KES 900',
            description: 'Spicy pepperoni with mozzarella cheese and tomato sauce',
            category: 'Classic Pizzas',
            image: '/images/food/papa-johns-pepperoni.jpg',
            isPromo: false,
            calories: '850',
            serves: '2-3 people',
            allergens: ['Gluten', 'Dairy', 'Pork'],
            preparationTime: '15-20 min',
            spiceLevel: 'Medium',
            tags: ['Classic', 'Spicy', 'Pepperoni'],
            vegetarian: false,
            signature: false,
            size: 'Medium',
            crust: 'Original Crust'
          },
          {
            id: 'cp-003',
            name: 'Hawaiian',
            price: 'KES 850',
            description: 'Ham and pineapple with mozzarella cheese and tomato sauce',
            category: 'Classic Pizzas',
            image: '/images/food/papa-johns-hawaiian.jpg',
            isPromo: false,
            calories: '800',
            serves: '2-3 people',
            allergens: ['Gluten', 'Dairy', 'Pork'],
            preparationTime: '15-20 min',
            spiceLevel: 'Mild',
            tags: ['Classic', 'Sweet', 'Hawaiian'],
            vegetarian: false,
            signature: false,
            size: 'Medium',
            crust: 'Original Crust'
          }
        ],
        'Specialty Pizzas': [
          {
            id: 'spp-001',
            name: 'Meat Lovers',
            price: 'KES 1,400',
            description: 'Pepperoni, sausage, bacon, ham, and ground beef with mozzarella',
            category: 'Specialty Pizzas',
            image: '/images/food/papa-johns-meat-lovers.jpg',
            isPromo: false,
            calories: '1,350',
            serves: '3-4 people',
            allergens: ['Gluten', 'Dairy', 'Pork', 'Beef'],
            preparationTime: '20-25 min',
            spiceLevel: 'Medium',
            tags: ['Specialty', 'Meat', 'Loaded'],
            vegetarian: false,
            signature: false,
            size: 'Large',
            crust: 'Original Crust'
          },
          {
            id: 'spp-002',
            name: 'Supreme',
            price: 'KES 1,250',
            description: 'Pepperoni, sausage, mushrooms, green peppers, onions, and black olives',
            category: 'Specialty Pizzas',
            image: '/images/food/papa-johns-supreme.jpg',
            isPromo: false,
            calories: '1,150',
            serves: '3-4 people',
            allergens: ['Gluten', 'Dairy', 'Pork', 'Mushrooms'],
            preparationTime: '18-25 min',
            spiceLevel: 'Medium',
            tags: ['Specialty', 'Loaded', 'Popular'],
            vegetarian: false,
            signature: false,
            size: 'Large',
            crust: 'Original Crust'
          }
        ],
        'Pasta': [
          {
            id: 'pa-001',
            name: 'Chicken Alfredo',
            price: 'KES 650',
            description: 'Fettuccine pasta with creamy Alfredo sauce and grilled chicken',
            category: 'Pasta',
            image: '/images/food/papa-johns-chicken-alfredo.jpg',
            isPromo: false,
            calories: '720',
            serves: '1-2 people',
            allergens: ['Gluten', 'Dairy', 'Chicken'],
            preparationTime: '12-18 min',
            spiceLevel: 'Mild',
            tags: ['Pasta', 'Creamy', 'Chicken'],
            vegetarian: false,
            signature: false
          },
          {
            id: 'pa-002',
            name: 'Spaghetti Bolognese',
            price: 'KES 600',
            description: 'Spaghetti with rich tomato sauce and ground beef',
            category: 'Pasta',
            image: '/images/food/papa-johns-spaghetti-bolognese.jpg',
            isPromo: false,
            calories: '680',
            serves: '1-2 people',
            allergens: ['Gluten', 'Beef'],
            preparationTime: '12-18 min',
            spiceLevel: 'Mild',
            tags: ['Pasta', 'Classic', 'Beef'],
            vegetarian: false,
            signature: false
          }
        ],
        'Chicken': [
          {
            id: 'ch-001',
            name: 'Chicken Wings (8 Pcs)',
            price: 'KES 750',
            description: '8 crispy chicken wings with your choice of sauce',
            category: 'Chicken',
            image: '/images/food/papa-johns-chicken-wings.jpg',
            isPromo: false,
            calories: '680',
            serves: '2 people',
            allergens: ['Chicken', 'Gluten'],
            preparationTime: '15-20 min',
            spiceLevel: 'Medium',
            tags: ['Chicken', 'Wings', 'Crispy'],
            vegetarian: false,
            signature: false
          },
          {
            id: 'ch-002',
            name: 'Chicken Strips (6 Pcs)',
            price: 'KES 650',
            description: '6 breaded chicken strips served with dipping sauce',
            category: 'Chicken',
            image: '/images/food/papa-johns-chicken-strips.jpg',
            isPromo: false,
            calories: '580',
            serves: '2 people',
            allergens: ['Chicken', 'Gluten', 'Eggs'],
            preparationTime: '12-18 min',
            spiceLevel: 'Mild',
            tags: ['Chicken', 'Strips', 'Breaded'],
            vegetarian: false,
            signature: false
          }
        ],
        'Sides': [
          {
            id: 'sd-001',
            name: 'Breadsticks (6 Pcs)',
            price: 'KES 300',
            description: '6 soft breadsticks with garlic butter and herbs',
            category: 'Sides',
            image: '/images/food/papa-johns-breadsticks.jpg',
            isPromo: false,
            calories: '320',
            serves: '2-3 people',
            allergens: ['Gluten', 'Dairy'],
            preparationTime: '5-8 min',
            spiceLevel: 'Mild',
            tags: ['Sides', 'Bread', 'Garlic'],
            vegetarian: true,
            signature: false
          },
          {
            id: 'sd-002',
            name: 'French Fries (Large)',
            price: 'KES 250',
            description: 'Large portion of crispy golden fries seasoned with salt',
            category: 'Sides',
            image: '/images/food/papa-johns-french-fries.jpg',
            isPromo: false,
            calories: '420',
            serves: '1-2 people',
            allergens: ['Potatoes'],
            preparationTime: '8-12 min',
            spiceLevel: 'None',
            tags: ['Sides', 'Fries', 'Crispy'],
            vegetarian: true,
            signature: false
          }
        ],
        'Beverages': [
          {
            id: 'bv-001',
            name: 'Coca Cola (1.5L)',
            price: 'KES 180',
            description: 'Refreshing Coca Cola soft drink',
            category: 'Beverages',
            image: '/images/food/papa-johns-coca-cola.jpg',
            isPromo: false,
            calories: '630',
            serves: '2-3 people',
            allergens: ['None'],
            preparationTime: '1-2 min',
            spiceLevel: 'None',
            tags: ['Beverages', 'Soft Drink', 'Refreshing'],
            vegetarian: true,
            signature: false
          },
          {
            id: 'bv-002',
            name: 'Sprite (1.5L)',
            price: 'KES 180',
            description: 'Clear lemon-lime soft drink',
            category: 'Beverages',
            image: '/images/food/papa-johns-sprite.jpg',
            isPromo: false,
            calories: '600',
            serves: '2-3 people',
            allergens: ['None'],
            preparationTime: '1-2 min',
            spiceLevel: 'None',
            tags: ['Beverages', 'Soft Drink', 'Lemon-Lime'],
            vegetarian: true,
            signature: false
          }
        ],
        'Desserts': [
          {
            id: 'ds-001',
            name: 'Chocolate Chip Cookie',
            price: 'KES 200',
            description: 'Fresh baked chocolate chip cookie',
            category: 'Desserts',
            image: '/images/food/papa-johns-chocolate-cookie.jpg',
            isPromo: false,
            calories: '280',
            serves: '1 person',
            allergens: ['Gluten', 'Dairy', 'Eggs'],
            preparationTime: '2-3 min',
            spiceLevel: 'None',
            tags: ['Dessert', 'Cookie', 'Chocolate'],
            vegetarian: true,
            signature: false
          },
          {
            id: 'ds-002',
            name: 'Brownie',
            price: 'KES 250',
            description: 'Rich chocolate brownie with fudge',
            category: 'Desserts',
            image: '/images/food/papa-johns-brownie.jpg',
            isPromo: false,
            calories: '320',
            serves: '1 person',
            allergens: ['Gluten', 'Dairy', 'Eggs'],
            preparationTime: '2-3 min',
            spiceLevel: 'None',
            tags: ['Dessert', 'Brownie', 'Chocolate'],
            vegetarian: true,
            signature: false
          }
        ]
      },
      promotions: [
        {
          id: 'promo-001',
          title: 'Large Pizza Deal',
          description: 'Get any large pizza for only KES 1,200 (Save up to KES 300)',
          discount: 'Save up to KES 300',
          validUntil: '2024-12-31',
          code: 'LARGEPIZZA',
          timing: 'Available Daily'
        },
        {
          id: 'promo-002',
          title: 'Family Bundle',
          description: 'Large pizza + 2 sides + 1.5L drink for only KES 1,800',
          discount: 'Save KES 400',
          validUntil: '2024-12-31',
          code: 'FAMILYBUNDLE',
          timing: 'Available Daily'
        },
        {
          id: 'promo-003',
          title: 'Student Discount',
          description: '20% off all orders with valid student ID',
          discount: 'Save 20%',
          validUntil: '2024-12-31',
          code: 'STUDENT20',
          timing: 'Available Daily'
        }
      ],
      deliveryInfo: {
        available: true,
        services: ['Jumia Food', 'Glovo', 'Uber Eats', 'Own Delivery'],
        deliveryTime: '25-35 minutes',
        deliveryFee: 'KES 150',
        minimumOrder: 'KES 800',
        freeDeliveryThreshold: 'KES 2,000',
        guarantee: '35 minutes or free'
      },
      locations: [
        'Westlands',
        'CBD',
        'Kilimani',
        'Lavington',
        'Karen',
        'Mombasa Road',
        'Thika Road',
        'Nakuru',
        'Mombasa',
        'Kisumu',
        'Eldoret',
        'Kakamega',
        'Nyeri',
        'Embu',
        'Meru',
        'Thika',
        'Machakos',
        'Kiambu'
      ],
      deals: [
        'Large Pizza Deal',
        'Family Bundle',
        'Student Discount',
        'Weekend Special',
        'Lunch Special',
        'Happy Hour'
      ],
      rewards: {
        available: true,
        program: 'Papa Rewards',
        benefits: ['Points on every order', 'Free pizza on birthday', 'Exclusive member deals', 'Early access to promotions']
      },
      customization: {
        available: true,
        options: {
          sizes: ['Small', 'Medium', 'Large', 'Extra Large'],
          crusts: ['Original Crust', 'Thin Crust', 'Pan', 'Stuffed Crust', 'Gluten Free'],
          toppings: ['Pepperoni', 'Sausage', 'Bacon', 'Ham', 'Chicken', 'Mushrooms', 'Green Peppers', 'Onions', 'Black Olives', 'Pineapple', 'Extra Cheese', 'Spinach'],
          sauces: ['Tomato', 'BBQ', 'Alfredo', 'Ranch', 'Hot Sauce', 'Pesto']
        }
      }
    };
  },

  // Helper functions
  findPapaJohnsId(searchData) {
    // Logic to find Papa John's ID in search results
    const papaJohns = searchData.restaurants?.find(r =>
      r.name.toLowerCase().includes('papa john') || r.name.toLowerCase().includes('papajohns')
    );
    return papaJohns?.id;
  },

  transformDirectMenuData(data) {
    // Transform direct API data to our format
    return {
      restaurant: PAPA_JOHNS_CONFIG,
      categories: data.categories || {},
      promotions: data.promotions || [],
      deliveryInfo: data.delivery || {},
      locations: data.locations || [],
      deals: data.deals || [],
      rewards: data.rewards || {},
      customization: data.customization || {}
    };
  },

  transformJumiaMenuData(data) {
    // Transform Jumia Food data to our format
    return {
      restaurant: PAPA_JOHNS_CONFIG,
      categories: this.groupByCategory(data.menu || []),
      promotions: data.promotions || [],
      deliveryInfo: {
        available: true,
        services: ['Jumia Food'],
        deliveryTime: data.deliveryTime || '25-35 minutes',
        deliveryFee: data.deliveryFee || 'KES 150',
        minimumOrder: data.minimumOrder || 'KES 800'
      },
      locations: data.locations || [],
      deals: data.deals || [],
      rewards: data.rewards || {},
      customization: data.customization || {}
    };
  },

  transformGlovoMenuData(data) {
    // Transform Glovo data to our format
    return {
      restaurant: PAPA_JOHNS_CONFIG,
      categories: this.groupByCategory(data.menu || []),
      promotions: data.promotions || [],
      deliveryInfo: {
        available: true,
        services: ['Glovo'],
        deliveryTime: data.deliveryTime || '25-35 minutes',
        deliveryFee: data.deliveryFee || 'KES 150',
        minimumOrder: data.minimumOrder || 'KES 800'
      },
      locations: data.locations || [],
      deals: data.deals || [],
      rewards: data.rewards || {},
      customization: data.customization || {}
    };
  },

  groupByCategory(menuItems) {
    // Group menu items by category
    const categories = {};
    menuItems.forEach(item => {
      if (!categories[item.category]) {
        categories[item.category] = [];
      }
      categories[item.category].push(item);
    });
    return categories;
  },

  // Get restaurant information
  getRestaurantInfo() {
    return PAPA_JOHNS_CONFIG.restaurant;
  },

  // Get current promotions
  async getPromotions() {
    // Mock promotions for now, as TheMealDB doesn't provide a direct promotions endpoint
    return [
      {
        id: 'promo-001',
        title: 'Large Pizza Deal',
        description: 'Get any large pizza for only KES 1,200 (Save up to KES 300)',
        discount: 'Save up to KES 300',
        validUntil: '2024-12-31',
        code: 'LARGEPIZZA',
        timing: 'Available Daily'
      },
      {
        id: 'promo-002',
        title: 'Family Bundle',
        description: 'Large pizza + 2 sides + 1.5L drink for only KES 1,800',
        discount: 'Save KES 400',
        validUntil: '2024-12-31',
        code: 'FAMILYBUNDLE',
        timing: 'Available Daily'
      },
      {
        id: 'promo-003',
        title: 'Student Discount',
        description: '20% off all orders with valid student ID',
        discount: 'Save 20%',
        validUntil: '2024-12-31',
        code: 'STUDENT20',
        timing: 'Available Daily'
      }
    ];
  },

  // Check delivery availability
  async checkDeliveryAvailability() {
    // Mock delivery info for now
    return {
      available: true,
      services: ['Jumia Food', 'Glovo', 'Uber Eats', 'Own Delivery'],
      deliveryTime: '25-35 minutes',
      deliveryFee: 'KES 150',
      minimumOrder: 'KES 800',
      freeDeliveryThreshold: 'KES 2,000',
      guarantee: '35 minutes or free'
    };
  },

  // Get deals
  async getDeals() {
    // Mock deals for now
    return [
      'Large Pizza Deal',
      'Family Bundle',
      'Student Discount',
      'Weekend Special',
      'Lunch Special',
      'Happy Hour'
    ];
  },

  // Get rewards info
  async getRewards() {
    // Mock rewards info for now
    return {
      available: true,
      program: 'Papa Rewards',
      benefits: ['Points on every order', 'Free pizza on birthday', 'Exclusive member deals', 'Early access to promotions']
    };
  },

  // Get customization options
  async getCustomization() {
    // Mock customization info for now
    return {
      available: true,
      options: {
        sizes: ['Small', 'Medium', 'Large', 'Extra Large'],
        crusts: ['Original Crust', 'Thin Crust', 'Pan', 'Stuffed Crust', 'Gluten Free'],
        toppings: ['Pepperoni', 'Sausage', 'Bacon', 'Ham', 'Chicken', 'Mushrooms', 'Green Peppers', 'Onions', 'Black Olives', 'Pineapple', 'Extra Cheese', 'Spinach'],
        sauces: ['Tomato', 'BBQ', 'Alfredo', 'Ranch', 'Hot Sauce', 'Pesto']
      }
    };
  },

  // Get all locations
  async getLocations() {
    // Mock locations for now
    return [
      'Westlands',
      'CBD',
      'Kilimani',
      'Lavington',
      'Karen',
      'Mombasa Road',
      'Thika Road',
      'Nakuru',
      'Mombasa',
      'Kisumu',
      'Eldoret',
      'Kakamega',
      'Nyeri',
      'Embu',
      'Meru',
      'Thika',
      'Machakos',
      'Kiambu'
    ];
  }
};

export default papaJohnsAPI;
